S01kbavk93u:1: niścetano 'py ucitacetanatām ivaiti yaḥ pūjyapūjanavidhau kusumādivargaḥ // KAvk_93.1 //
S01kbavk93u:5: bhagavan prauḍhim āyātā kanyā mama sumāgadhā // KAvk_93.3 //
S01kbavk93u:8: kanyāṃ dadāmi tāṃ tasmai bhagavan yadi manyase /
S01kbavk93u:11: ko doṣas tanayā tasmai dīyatām ity abhāṣata // KAvk_93.6 //
S01kbavk93u:12: śāstuḥ śāsanam ādāya sādaraṃ pranipatya tam /
S01kbavk93u:15: arhāyaṃ sa dadau tasmai bhūriratnāmbarapradaḥ // KAvk_93.8 //
S01kbavk93u:16: dattā dūrataraṃ deśam atha yāntī sumāgadhā /
S01kbavk93u:23: gṛhān naḥ prātar āgantā jagatpūjyaguṇo jinaḥ // KAvk_93.12 //
S01kbavk93u:26: ity uktā sā tayā tatra babhūvārambhatatparā /
S01kbavk93u:27: jñātvā bhikṣugaṇāyeva tāṃ pūjāṃ parikalpitām // KAvk_93.14 //
S01kbavk93u:35: digambarāṇām apy agre yad ihāste vadhūjanaḥ // KAvk_93.18 //
S01kbavk93u:37: amānuṣatvān naiteṣāṃ lajjante nūnam aṅganāḥ // KAvk_93.19 //
S01kbavk93u:38: asthāne bhavatāṃ bhaktiḥ ko 'yam ucchṛṅkhalaḥ kramaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:39: na tyaktam aśanaṃ yena sa kathaṃ vastram ujjhati // KAvk_93.20 //
S01kbavk93u:42: dambhārambhabhayaṃkare ca vadane krodhaḥ svayaṃ lakṣyate
S01kbavk93u:43: nagnānām aśanaiṣiṇāṃ niyaminām eṣāṃ paśūnām iva // KAvk_93.21 //
S01kbavk93u:44: yatraite paśavaḥ pūjyās tatrotsāryā bhavanti ke /
S01kbavk93u:46: iti bruvāṇāṃ tāṃ śvaśrūr viṣaṇṇā pratyabhāṣata /
S01kbavk93u:47: pitus te bhavane bhadre pūjyate vada kīdṛśaḥ // KAvk_93.23 //
S01kbavk93u:48: sāvadan matpitur gehe pūjyate bhagavān jinaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:53: kāntyaivāsau kim api viduṣāṃ śāntim antas tanoti // KAvk_93.25 //
S01kbavk93u:59: niḥśeṣitasmṛtibhuvaḥ pramadāśrayasya rāgojjhitasya sutarām adharaḥ sarāgaḥ // KAvk_93.27 //
S01kbavk93u:61: kṣāntis tanmayakāriṇī hṛdi dayā gāḍhaṃ samāśleṣiṇī /
S01kbavk93u:64: pūjyaḥ sa bhavane 'smākaṃ yasya pravrajyayā satām /
S01kbavk93u:67: rāgadveṣogradaṃṣṭreṇa bādhyate na punar janaḥ // KAvk_93.30 //
S01kbavk93u:68: iti tasyā vacaḥ śvaśrūḥ śrutvā śrotrarasāyanam /
S01kbavk93u:69: sadyaḥ prasādaviśadā tāṃ jagāda pramodinī // KAvk_93.31 //
S01kbavk93u:71: api tvatpuṇyasaṃbandhād vayam apy amṛtāspadam // KAvk_93.32 //
S01kbavk93u:73: taṃ vaḥ saṃdarśayāmīti babhāṣe bhaktimāninī // KAvk_93.33 //
S01kbavk93u:81: tavāśramamṛgīvāhaṃ dūraṃ deśam imam gatā // KAvk_93.37 //
S01kbavk93u:82: tvatpādapadmayugalaṃ śaraṇam prapannāṃ dūrasthitām api dṛśā spṛśa māṃ dayālo /
S01kbavk93u:83: vātsalyapeśaladhiyāṃ mahatāṃ pravāsadurīkṛteṣu karuṇā na tanutvam eti // KAvk_93.38 //
S01kbavk93u:85: prātar āgamanenaiva mānaṃ vitara me vibho // KAvk_93.39 //
S01kbavk93u:88: sā śvetaraktaharitāsitapuṣpapālī khe dhūpadhūmaśabalā śanakaiḥ prayāntī /
S01kbavk93u:89: bālāmbudapraṇayinī suciraṃ cakāśe saṃcālicāpalatikeva śacīdhavasya // KAvk_93.41 //
S01kbavk93u:91: sā bhaktiśālinī śāstuḥ papāta caraṇābjayoḥ // KAvk_93.42 //
S01kbavk93u:92: bhagavān api sarvajñaḥ sarvaṃ jñātvā samīhitam /
S01kbavk93u:93: sumāgadhāyāḥ kāruṇyād ānandam avadat puraḥ // KAvk_93.43 //
S01kbavk93u:97: ekenāhnā ca gantavyaṃ na vilambo 'tra yujyate // KAvk_93.45 //
S01kbavk93u:98: vyomnā maharddhyā śaknoti gantuṃ yo yaḥ prabhāvavān /
S01kbavk93u:99: nimantraṇaśalākāṃ tvaṃ tasmai tasmai samarpaya // KAvk_93.46 //
S01kbavk93u:103: pūrṇaḥ kumbhopadhānīyaḥ sthaviro 'py agrahīt kramāt // KAvk_93.48 //
S01kbavk93u:105: pāṇau prāha tam ānandaḥ kiṃcit smitasitānanaḥ // KAvk_93.49 //
S01kbavk93u:109: acintayat svavargāgre nyūnabhāvo hi duḥsahaḥ // KAvk_93.5l //
S01kbavk93u:111: hantuṃ sapatnaiḥ śakyante prāptum ṛddhipadaṃ kiyat // KAvk_93.52 //
S01kbavk93u:113: prādur āsīt kṣaṇenaiva maharddhiḥ śuddhacetasaḥ // KAvk_93.53 //
S01kbavk93u:123: ūcuḥ sumāgadhāṃ prītyā kim eṣa bhagavān iti // KAvk_93.58 //
S01kbavk93u:127: kim ayaṃ kim ayaṃ bhadre bhagavān iti tāṃ jaguḥ // KAvk_93.60 //
S01kbavk93u:131: āścaryakṛn mūrta iva prabhāvaḥ śrīmān mahākāśyapa eṣa bhikṣuḥ // KAvk_93.62 //
S01kbavk93u:133: vyomnā samabhyeti gunaiḥ pragītaḥ sa eṣa bhikṣur bhuvi śāriputraḥ // KAvk_93.63 //
S01kbavk93u:134: āruhya kailāsam ivātiśubhraṃ dvipam caturdantam anantakāntiḥ /
S01kbavk93u:135: āyāti yaḥ puṇyavatāṃ jagatsu maudgalyanāmā ca sa eṣa bhikṣuḥ // KAvk_93.64 //
S01kbavk93u:137: upaiti yaḥ saurabhapūritāśaḥ sa eṣa bhikṣuḥ prathito 'niruddhaḥ // KAvk_93.65 //
S01kbavk93u:139: vigāhate sphitavanena bhikṣur maitrāyaṇīsūnur ayaṃ sa pūrṇaḥ // KAvk_93.66 //
S01kbavk93u:140: anantam āsthāya nitāntaśāntam īrṣyāpathaṃ sattvamahodadhir yaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:141: prabhāmṛtaiḥ sarpati tarpitāśaḥ prabhāvavān eṣyajid eṣa bhikṣuḥ // KAvk_93.67 //
S01kbavk93u:143: yaḥ puṇyapūrṇadyutir abhyupaiti sa eṣa bhikṣur matimān upālī // KAvk_93.68 //
S01kbavk93u:145: limpann ivāgacchati yaḥ prabhābhiḥ kātyāyano nāma sa eṣa bhikṣuḥ // KAvk_93.69 //
S01kbavk93u:146: śarīriṇaṃ dharmam ivādhiruhya vigāhate khaṃ vṛṣavāhano yaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:147: pṛṣṭhaḥ pratiṣṭhāpariniṣṭhitānāṃ gariṣṭhadhīḥ kauṣṭhila eṣa bhikṣuḥ // KAvk_93.70 //
S01kbavk93u:149: kurvan samabhyeti taponidhir yaḥ pilindavatsāhvaya eṣa bhikṣuḥ // KAvk_93.7l //
S01kbavk93u:151: sa śroṇakoṭiḥ śruta eṣa bhikṣur akṣuṇṇalakṣmīr gṛhanirvyapekṣaḥ // KAvk_93.72 //
S01kbavk93u:152: yaś cakravartī divi bhāti so 'yaṃ śāstuḥ suto rāhulakābhidhānaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:154: ete giribhyo 'tha digantarebhyaḥ kṣmāmaṇḍalād vyomataṭāntarāc ca /
S01kbavk93u:156: tayā krameṇeti nivedyamānaṃ te bhikṣusaṃghaṃ vimukhaṃ vilokya /
S01kbavk93u:157: yayuḥ praharṣādbhutasaṃbhramāṇāṃ vidheyatāṃ tulyam ananyalakṣmyāḥ // KAvk_93.75 //
S01kbavk93u:161: amarapurapurastrīkīrṇapuṣpaprabhāvān nayanapatham ayāsīt puṇyabhājāṃ jinendraḥ // KAvk_93.77 //
S01kbavk93u:162: aṣṭādaśadvārapathā puraṃ tat sa tulyam aṣṭādaśamūrtir eva /
S01kbavk93u:163: praviśya cakre śaśikāntaratnaśikhāmayaṃ veśma sumāgadhāyāḥ // KAvk_93.78 //
S01kbavk93u:164: abhyarcitas tatra bahuprakāraiḥ pūrṇopacāraiḥ praṇipatya sarvaiḥ /
S01kbavk93u:165: apūjayat paurajanaḥ samantād bahiś ca bhittipratibimbitaṃ tam // KAvk_93.79 //
S01kbavk93u:166: sumāgadhāyā dayayā dayāluḥ pūjāṃ gṛhītvā bhagavān sasaṃghaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:168: sumāgadhā saśvaśurādivargā sahāparaiḥ paurajanaiś ca sarvāḥ /
S01kbavk93u:169: śāstus tayā deśanayā babhūvuḥ śuddhāśayās tatkṣaṇadṛṣṭasatyāḥ // KAvk_93.81 //
S01kbavk93u:170: sumāgadhāyāḥ kuśalānubandhaṃ puṇyaṃ prabhāvaṃ vipulaṃ vilokya /
S01kbavk93u:171: te bhikṣavas tatra kutūhalena papracchū ramyaṃ jinam ādivṛttam // KAvk_93.82 //
S01kbavk93u:172: pṛṣṭaḥ sa taiḥ saṃsadi sarvadarśī sumāgadhāyāḥ kuśalasya hetum /
S01kbavk93u:173: dantaprabhābhiḥ kakubhāṃ mukheṣu diśan prakāśam bhagavān babhāṣe // KAvk_93.83 //
S01kbavk93u:174: vārāṇasyām abhūt pūrvaṃ kṛkeḥ kantasya bhūpateḥ /
S01kbavk93u:177: paricaryāṃ vyadhāt sārdhaṃ sakhīnāṃ pañcabhiḥ śataiḥ // KAvk_93.85 //
S01kbavk93u:181: atipriyasya hṛdayaṃ hutvāgnau labhyate śivam // KAvk_93.87 //
S01kbavk93u:182: iti teṣām anādṛtya vacaḥ krūrataraṃ nṛpaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:183: bhagavantaṃ yayau draṣṭuṃ kāśyapaṃ duhitur girā // KAvk_93.88 //
S01kbavk93u:184: sa tam etyāvadat svapnaḥ savikāraḥ paraṃ mayā /
S01kbavk93u:185: dṛṣṭo 'dya sarvaṃ sarvajña tatphalaṃ vaktum arhasi // KAvk_93.89 //
S01kbavk93u:187: tṛṣitasya tathā paścāt kupo dhāvan vilokitaḥ // KAvk_93.90 //
S01kbavk93u:189: samīkṛtāni dṛṣṭāni kudārūṇi ca candanaiḥ // KAvk_93.9l //
S01kbavk93u:191: parān aśuciliptāṅgaḥ pralimpan viplutaḥ kapiḥ // KAvk_93.92 //
S01kbavk93u:193: paṭo 'ṣṭādaśabhiḥ kṛṣṭaḥ puruṣair apy asaṃkṣayaḥ // KAvk_93.93 //
S01kbavk93u:197: iti pṛṣṭaḥ kṣitibhujā bhagavān kāśyapo 'bravīt // KAvk_93.95 //
S01kbavk93u:198: śatāyuṣi jane śāstā śāntaḥ śākyamunir jinaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:199: bhaviṣyaty amṛtāmbhodhiḥ sa drṣṭaḥ kuñjaras tvayā // KAvk_93.96 //
S01kbavk93u:203: svayaṃ sevāṃ samālambya kariṣyanty eva deśanām // KAvk_93.98 //
S01kbavk93u:205: tṛṣitasya vrajan paścāt kūpas tasmād vilokitaḥ // KAvk_93.99 //
S01kbavk93u:209: sāmyam āpādayiṣyanti te maugdhyād aviśeṣiṇaḥ // KAvk_93.101 //
S01kbavk93u:211: duḥśīlakalabho bhikṣuḥ spardhayā dhik kariṣyati // KAvk_93.102 //
S01kbavk93u:217: mithaḥ kalahaśīlāś ca bhaviṣyanty apavādinaḥ // KAvk_93.105 //
S01kbavk93u:219: iti śāstur vacaḥ śrutvā vismito 'bhūn mahīpatiḥ // KAvk_93.106 //
S01kbavk93u:223: sā tena sukṛtenaiva jātā hemasrajāṅkitā // KAvk_93.108 //
S01kbavk93u:227: rucā saṃpūrayann āśāṃ yayau jetavanaṃ jinaḥ // KAvk_93.ll0 //
S01kbavk93u:229: sūnuś ced aguṇas tad eva viphalaṃ tat kiṃ na sarvaṃ kulam /
S01kbavk93u:230: sā kanyā kila jāyate guṇavatī puṇyaprabhāvād yayā
S01kbavk93u:231: saṃsārorusaritpatau kulayugam nāv eva saṃtāryate // KAvk_93.111 //
S01kbavk93u:232: iti kṣemendraviracitāyāṃ bodhisattvāvadānakalpalatāyāṃ sumāgadhāvadānaṃ trinavatitamaḥ pallavah.
